Why is a new Local Plan being produced? 2.1 All Local Planning Authorities are required by the National Planning Policy Framework to have an up-to-date Local Plan. Without an up-todate Local Plan, Tower Hamlets would see a reduced ability to apply local discretion on deciding planning applications.
